Reviews.Title: “A Hidden Jewel off The Beaten Path”
Reviews.Author: ronniebrit
Reviews.Content: novice traveller wasnt afraid stay beaten path stay mexico city lark hotel located pricy zona rosa district stones throw elegant paseo de la reforma easily reach major city short walk metro stop metrobus isnt center town price paid 3300 night shocked size cleanliness amenities complementary bottles water hotel restaurant offers reasonably priced menu found wonderful local restaurant five minuets cafe located heroes offered wide selection local international cuisine friendly excellent service lark hotel truly hidden jewel intend hotel choice future frequent trips mexico city
